text: Atlanta Chiefs was a soccer club which played in the United States. It played first from 1967 until 1972. It was reformed in 1979 until it folded in 1981. ==League position== Season League Position 1968 NASL Champions 1969 NASL 2nd 1970 NASL 2nd / South 1971 NASL Final 1972 NASL 3rd / South 1973 NASL 3rd / South 1979 NASL 4th / NATIONAL Center 1980 NASL 4th / NATIONAL Center 1981 NASL Playoff First round ==References== Category:1967 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:1972 disestablishments in the United States Category:1979 establishments in the United States Category:1981 disestablishments in the United States Category:Sports in Atlanta Category:20th-century disestablishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:1960s establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Defunct American soccer teams
title: Atlanta Chiefs
